title: Person of interest in Nashville bombing identified by authorities
author: CBS Evening News
comment: Imagine believing that you've gotten away with something that extreme... only to be snitched out by Google Maps.
I can’t tell if the narrator is about to cry or if that’s his normal voice.
"evacuate now" ironically turned out to be the trigger.
These comments are mostly about how the man who’s speaking sounds rather than about the investigation
That’s his voice.He is an excellent reporter. Give him a break!!
description:
At least one person of interest has been identified in connection to the explosion of a recreational vehicle in downtown Nashville, Tennessee on Christmas morning. Multiple sources confirm that Anthony Quinn Warner, a Nashville area resident, had a similar make and model RV as the one in photos released to the public. Jeff Pegues has more.

Subscribe to the "CBS Evening News" Channel HERE:
